import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../public/style/components/header.css' import { Row, Col, Menu } from 'antd' import { HomeOutlined, VideoCameraOutlined, ContainerOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import Router from 'next/router' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' import ApiUrl from '../config/urls' import { getUrl } from '../public/utils/util' const Header = () =>{ const [navArray,setArray] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ const result =async ()=>await getUrl(ApiUrl.getNavList) console.log('---------',result()) },[]) return(
KIKA 前端问之我答 - 技术博客 首页 视频 文章
) } export default Header
